name: Oversized Band Tee
description: A shirt from a band you've definitely heard of. Probably.

name: Thrifted Blazer
description: Slightly musty, very sustainable. Makes you look like you have meetings.

name: Lululemon Athleisure Set
description: Yoga pants and matching top. You could work out in this. You won't.

name: Patagonia Fleece of Privilege
description: The official uniform of venture capitalists and trust fund hikers.

name: Vintage Denim Jacket
description: Covered in pins and patches expressing your personality.

name: Uniqlo Basic Armor
description: Minimalist Japanese design. Suspiciously affordable quality.

name: Hoodie of Corporate Casual
description: A startup hoodie with a failed company logo. Vintage now.

name: Normcore Ensemble
description: Aggressively average clothing. You blend in everywhere.

name: The All-Black Outfit
description: Head to toe black. Either a designer or a barista.

name: Sustainable Hemp Clothing
description: Itchy but ethical. You will tell everyone about it.

name: Convertible Travel Pants
description: Zip-off legs for any climate. Peak digital nomad.

name: Merino Wool Base Layer
description: Doesn't smell even after 5 days. You've tested this.

name: Fast Fashion Chic
description: Falls apart after 3 washes. But it was $5.

name: Designer Streetwear
description: Supreme/Off-White/Whatever's hype. Your outfit costs rent.

name: Gorpcore Tactical Vest
description: So many pockets. You need zero of them.

name: Techwear Ensemble
description: All black, waterproof, covered in straps. Cyberpunk cosplay.

name: Startup Branded Merch Armor
description: A complete outfit of free swag from failed startups.

name: The Power Suit
description: Tailored. Sharp. You mean business. Literally.

name: Vintage Band Jacket
description: A leather or denim jacket covered in music history.

name: Influencer Aesthetic Armor
description: Whatever's trending on Instagram this week. Rotates seasonally.

name: Cozy Cardigan of Comfort
description: Oversized, soft, gives off approachable vibes.

name: The Podcast Host Uniform
description: Henley, nice watch, strategic stubble energy.

name: Festival Battle Gear
description: Glitter, mesh, comfortable shoes. Survives 3-day events.

name: Workwear Cosplay
description: Carhartt and Red Wings. You've never done manual labor.

name: Athleisure Armor of Productivity
description: You look like you just came from the gym. You didn't.

name: The Zoom Mullet
description: Nice on top, pajamas on bottom. Work from home standard.

name: Old Money Aesthetic
description: Quiet luxury. No logos. Screams wealth through subtlety.

name: Tropical Shirt of Confidence
description: Bold patterns. You either have incredible taste or none.

name: Cottagecore Battle Dress
description: Flowy, floral, makes you want to bake bread.

name: Dark Academia Robes
description: Tweed, turtlenecks, and an air of pretension.

name: Elephant Pants of the Initiate
description: The first purchase of every backpacker in Thailand. Comfortable. Obvious.

name: Chang Singlet of Brotherhood
description: A tank top advertising cheap Thai beer. You are now a walking billboard.

name: Full Moon Party Survivor Gear
description: Neon paint, bucket stains, and UV reactive materials. Battle-tested.

name: Fisherman Pants
description: Wrap-style pants. Comfortable. Will make you look like you just did yoga.

name: Thai Silk Shirt of Diplomacy
description: Elegant Thai silk. Actually appropriate formal wear.

name: Harajuku Layers
description: Five shirts, three skirts, two jackets. Maximum fashion. Movement restricted.

name: Shibuya Streetwear
description: Avant-garde Japanese street fashion. Designer but subtle.

name: Uniqlo Heattech Base
description: Japanese thermal technology. Deceptively warm.

name: Muji Minimalist Ensemble
description: No labels. No logos. Maximum sophistication through simplicity.

name: Anime T-Shirt of Devotion
description: Your waifu on your chest. Bold choice.

name: Kimono Rental Fit
description: Tourist kimono rental. Authentic-adjacent.

name: Salaryman Suit
description: Black or navy. White shirt. The Japanese corporate uniform.

name: K-Beauty Glow Armor
description: The result of a 10-step skincare routine. Glass skin achieved.

name: K-Pop Fansite Uniform
description: All black. Professional camera. Ready for airport pickups.

name: Hanbok (Modern)
description: Korean traditional dress. Instagram royalty.

name: Gangnam Plastic Perfection
description: Post-surgery recovery complete. Unnaturally beautiful.

name: Hongdae Indie Look
description: Oversized everything. Artfully disheveled. You're in a band (you're not).

name: Taiwan Night Market Chic
description: Practical, cute, ready for street food. Layers for AC temples.

name: Taipei Tech District Style
description: Clean lines, functional design, hint of cyberpunk.

name: Bubble Tea Shop Employee Aesthetic
description: Pastel colors, apron energy, aggressively cute.

name: Shanghai Expat Package Look
description: Designer everything. Subtle but clearly expensive. Peak Jing'an.

name: French Concession Vintage
description: Carefully curated vintage finds. Every piece has a story you'll tell.

name: Chinese Auntie Pajama Armor
description: Matching silk pajamas worn in public. Maximum comfort. Zero shame.

name: Taobao Mystery Box Fashion
description: Random clothes from Taobao. Could be anything. Quality unknown.

name: Fresh Off the Plane Outfit
description: Whatever you wore from home. Marks you as new arrival.

name: REI Tactical Tourist
description: Zip-off everything. 47 pockets. Carabiners. You're ready for anything.

name: Dad on Vacation Starter Pack
description: Cargo shorts, white New Balance, tucked polo. Complete.

name: Gap Year Uniform
description: Tie-dye, bracelets from 'a village,' questionable facial hair choices.

name: Luxury Resort Casual
description: Linen everything. Subtle designer. Island chic.

name: Motorbike Armor (Bangkok)
description: Shorts, flip flops, no helmet. Standard Bangkok riding gear.
